tasks.task: Driving a combine header to a field
subtasks: Lift the combine header onto the tractor
Secure the combine header to the tractor
Maneuver the combine header into the field
Align the combine header with the direction of harvest
Operate the combine's control levers
Monitor the combine's grain tank level
Adjust combine settings for optimal grain separation
Guide the grain cart alongside the combine
Open the combine's unloading gate
Synchronize the combine's unloading with grain cart's opening

tasks.task: Transferring grain from grain cart to storage bin
subtasks: Drive the grain cart to the storage bin location
Lower the grain cart's auger system
Connect the grain cart's auger to the storage bin's inlet
Start the grain cart's auger motor

tasks.task: Unloading grain bins using a telescopic unloader
subtasks: Position the telescopic unloader under the grain bin's outlet
Extend the telescopic unloader arm to engage the grain bin's auger
Start the grain bin's auger to unload grain into the telescopic unloader
Stop the combine's grain elevator
Disconnect the elevator's unloading chute
Inspect the elevator for blockages or damage
Clear any obstructions from the elevator

tasks.task: Checking grain moisture content with a grain moisture meter
subtasks: Take a sample from a freshly harvested grain
Insert the grain sample into the moisture meter

tasks.task: Checking grain test weight with a scale
subtasks: Weigh a representative sample of grain in different moisture conditions
Attach fertilizer applicator to the tractor
Follow the designated field map for application rates
Monitor the applicator's working width and speed
